title: Why does loading the client take so long?
body: So I play League on my mom's old macbook air(early 2015 ver) and the loading takes like 10-15 minutes to load. Is there reason or anyway to fix this?

replies.body:
> macbook air 2015

1.6Ghz trash CPU, probably a slow drive as well. Does it have a SSD or HDD?

Plus the mac client is just bad, on top of mac hardware being bad.
